This was a triumph //这是一个艰苦的胜利
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS //我在这里写下了一句话：伟大的成功
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction //我的兴奋之情难以言表
Aperture Science //光圈科学
We do what we must because we can //我们因梦而尽力而为
For the good of all of us //为了我们中的优秀者
Except the ones who are DEAD //除了已经死去的人
But there's no sense crying over every mistake //不必为每次失败而哭泣
You just keep on trying till you run out of CAKE //蛋糕是你奋斗的力量之源
And the SCIENCE gets done //当这项科技完成之时
And you make a NEAT GUN //你会见到那洁白的传送枪
For the people who are still alive //这是生者的希望
I'm not even angry //我仍未恼怒
I'm being so sincere right now //我现在将心比心
Even though you broke my heart //即使你粉碎了我的心灵
And killed me //还毁灭了我的肉体
And tore me to pieces //把我撕成碎块
And threw every piece into a fire //将我焚烧殆尽
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you! //当我化为飞灰之时我感到伤心，因为我曾为你喝彩
Now these points of data make a beautiful line //现在数据汇成繁星点点
And we're out of beta //我们凤凰涅盘
We're releasing on time //获得新生
So I'm GLaD I got burned //我将自己献给了烈火
Think of all the things we learned //想想我们的知识
From the people who are still alive //那是生者的智慧结晶
Go ahead and leave me //勇往直前吧
I think I prefer to stay in side //我甘愿作为绿叶
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you //或许一天你会找到同道中人
May be Black Mesa //是黑山么
THAT WAS A JOKE //开玩笑的
AHA, FAT CHANCE //啊哈，想都别想
Anyway, this cake is great //不管怎样，这块蛋糕不错
It's so delicious and moist //甜美松软
Look at me still talking when there's SCIENCE to do //看看我，我一边说话一边进行研究
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you //当我向窗外看去，我因不是你而感到快乐
I've experiments to run //我要做实验
There is research to be done //还有研究未完成
On the people who are still alive //生者就是小白鼠
And believe me I am still alive //我相信我还活着
I'm doing SCIENCE and I'm still alive //我因科学而存在
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive //我因感知而存在
While you're dying I'll be still alive //我会看着你灭亡
And when you're dead I will be still alive //我永垂不朽
Still alive //不朽
STILL ALIVE //到永远

Oyun gerçekten güzel. Ne kadar çabuk bitirilebilse de gerçekten o kısa zamanı dolu dolu yaşayabileceğiniz, sizi singleplayer modunda ilerledikçe başından kaldıramayacak güzel senaryolu ve zekice tasarlanmış bir oyun. Hele ki bir arkadaşınızla beraber alıp CO-OP yaparsanız oyun cidden tadından yenmiyor. Zamanın nasıl geçtiğini anlamıyorsunuz ve kendinizi oyuna bağlıyorsunuz. Kesinlikle tavsiyem olan bir oyun.

[h1]烧脑大作，玩多头疼[/h1]
--------------------------------------------------------------
其实只是为了一章一章一次一次的通关，可以说是如果没有足够的空间思维和推理能力还是不要购买这个游戏，[b]十分烧脑[/b]，一次游玩不足两个小时可以说是耐心再好也会有些头疼了。

[h1][u][i]急性子的人千万不要买[/i][/u][/h1]
--------------------------------------------------------------
玩多了砸电脑不要怨我，到到三章我每过一关我都要花费[u]20分钟乃至1个小时[/u]，极强的空间思维和推理能力是非常重要的(再次提醒)！

最后附上一个完结攻略的地址
---------------------------------------------------------------
[spoiler]其实看了也没什么用，别看了[/spoiler]

Portal 2 is probably one of the best games i've ever played so far. This game is one of valve's giants and rightly so. Portal 2 is twice as good if you have a friend to play with in the new "Cooperative Testing Initiative" aka Co-op mode. I'm not very good at portal so the game took me 7 hours to complete but if you are a hardcore portal fan and somehow don't own this game yet it will probably take you around 3-4 hours. The story mode is amazing and has a mind blowing plot twist. (Not going to spoil it for you.) There is also a mode where you can design your own custom test chambers and upload them to the workshop for everyone to see and download, this feature alone adds countless hours of fun because when you beat story and co-op it gives you something to do! can I give this game a 9.5/10 for it's fantastic story telling, it's addictive gameplay and it's massive replay value!
My brain hurts trying to speedrun this game, nonetheless, was excecuted very well.
no hace falta leerse un toston de analisis, este es un juego con una jugabilidad y una historia espectacular y encima con las rebajas de verano con un precio ridiculo. RECOMENDADO 100%.

第一个喜+1的游戏，才玩 了6小时，欲罢不能。GLaDOS不愧史上最萌反派。
考验空间想象能力，无论是单人还是双人模式都很出彩，宣传片的机器人只出现在双人模式中（坑队友和表情模式超赞），单人是小姐姐。里面很多的机关非常值得尝试，干净的房间和鲜亮的颜色看着很舒服，后期废墟晕3D要控制游玩时间。

An oldie but a goodie, I can't even notice it's 6 years old now.
Overall great game, I didn't own any puzzle games yet I've loved Portal probably since the day it was released and I finally decided to buy it. I wasn't disappointed.

Edit: After 30 hours of overall gameplay i have finished both the solo and coop campaign and beat all the "challenge mode" chamber speedrun times my friends have set.
Simplemente Valve. No es necesario ni que critique nada, es una maravilla, mires donde lo mires.¿¿ Ademas en las ofertas de steam por 2 euros?? Es un regalo.
